product_name: Spark R&D Tesla System Magneto Baseplate Kit
long_description: The Spark R&D Tesla System Magneto Baseplate Kit lets you convert your 2011/2012 or 2012/2013 Spark R&D bindings to the new Tesla system so you can experience lightning fast transitions. Simply switch out your current heel loops, ankle straps and toe straps onto the new bases and you're ready to rock. Kit includes: Magneto baseplates, Tesla brackets, heel plates and screws.
short_description: The Spark R&D Tesla System Magneto Baseplate Kit lets you convert your 2011/2012 or 2012/2013 Spark R&D bindings to the new Tesla system so you can experience lightning fast transitions.
